title: Teen shot outside of Shreveport apartment
content:
Shreveport Police are searching for the person who shot a teen in the leg today.
A 16-year-old was shot near a recreational center in the 4300 block of Illinois Avenue in Shreveport's Mooretown neighborhood.
SPD received the call shortly after 11:30 a.m.
Police say the teen was shot while standing outside the New Zion Apartments. The teen was taken to University Health with non-life-threatening injuries.
The victim told police he was standing outside when a Black Honda Accord drove up and shot him. The suspect reportedly drove off after the incident.
Police are still investigating.
Check back for more details as they emerge.
